image-reference.title: Construction of walls to reduce impact sound and achieve a 50 RW: concrete blockwork

image.alt: Construction of walls to reduce impact sound and achieve a 50 RW: concrete blockwork.

desc-note.p: 190 mm thick concrete block masonry withâ€”

ol.li: each face of the blocks fitted with 50 mm x 50 mm timber battens, spaced at not more than 610 mm centres, screw-fixed into resilient plugs with rubber inserts; and
the space between the battens completely filled with mineral or glass wool blanket or batts not less than 50 mm thick; and
the outer face of the battens finished with plasterboard not less than 10 mm thick.
